data: {"generalSituation":"Under the persistent influence of a dry winter monsoon, the weather will be generally fine over Guangdong in the next couple of days. It will be cold in the morning. With the monsoon moderating slightly during the weekend, temperatures will rise slightly over southern China. It will still be cool in the morning. An easterly airstream is expected to affect the coast of southern China early next week. It will be windy over the region. The dry northeast monsoon will bring generally fine weather to the coast of Guangdong midweek next week.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20260108","week":"Thursday","forecastWind":"North to northeast force 4, occasionally force 5 offshore at first.","forecastWeather":"Fine.
